mapper.select: SELECT B.*, U.name AS writer_name FROM board B INNER JOIN user U ON B.writer_id = U.id ORDER BY idx desc

SELECT B.idx, B.title, B.content, B.writer_id, B.regist_date, B.modify_date, U.name AS writer_name, F.idx AS att_idx, F.old_filename AS att_filename, F.file_path AS store_path, F.new_filename AS base_filename FROM board B INNER JOIN user U ON B.writer_id = U.id LEFT OUTER JOIN board_att_file F ON B.idx = F.board_idx WHERE B.idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_att_file(board_idx, file_path, old_filename, new_filename, file_size, writer_id) VALUES(#{boardIdx}, #{filePath}, #{oldFilename}, #{newFilename}, #{fileSize}, #{writerId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board_att_file WHERE idx = #{idx} AND board_idx = #{boardIdx};
